ComicInfo.Summary:
ENTER: VENOMPOOL (OKAY, SO MAYBE IT DOES GET BADDER!)
VENOMPOOL! WOLVERINE! ZABU from the SAVAGE LAND! The IMPERIAL GUARD!
Welcome to KILLEVILLE, Deadpool, hope you survive the experience! Just who is ARCATA, and what are her nefarious plans for everyone's favorite Merc with a Mouth?!
ComicInfo.Notes: Scraped metadata from Amazon [ASINB0C5YMB44R], [RELDATE:2023-08-30] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 10:25:29. [Issue ID 2566044]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jay David Ramos,Rob Liefeld,Rod Reis,Romulo Fajardo Jr.
